content: Q3 revenue was $3.6 million, a decrease of 34.8% year-over-year and a decrease of 3.7% quarter-over-quarter. Looking at Q3 revenue by channel, subscription sales were approximately $2.9 million, a decrease of 39.6% year-over-year. Moving to revenue by subscription for the quarter, active subscriptions or recurring boxes decreased by 40.6% to $2.3 million year-over-year. Now, to the balance sheet and cash flow, cash at the end of the quarter was approximately $220,000, which we used $7 million in operating cash flow for the 39 weeks period compared to $5.6 million last year.
